title: VR Video Podcasts with Worked Examples for Pre-Calculus Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A short-term program for corporate managers/leaders to systematically acquire foundational calculus concepts through VR environments and video podcasts.

learning_goals: Learners can apply differentiation and integration methods of linear functions to solve practical problems.
Learners can interpret and explain rate-of-change patterns of functions through graph visualization.
Learners can perform calculus problem-solving processes using task examples in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) mobile learning app

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
